decisions.name: check_expense_type_with_Company_Expense_data
decisions.label: check expense type with Company Expense data

decisions.name: check_receipt_Required_and_receipt_not_present
decisions.label: check receipt Required and receipt not present

fields.name: Error1
fields.fieldText:
Resubmit the correct information.

Enter the proper value for the Amount as follows:

If the Expense type is Mileage, then Amount value <= {!mileageValue}

If the Expense type is Zone, then Amount value <= {!zoneValue}

If the Expense type is Per Diem, then Amount value <= {!perDiemValue}

If the Expense type is Cartage, then Amount value <= {!cartageValue}

If the Expense type is Other, then Amount value <= {!otherValue}

fields.name: SelectSHT
fields.fieldText: Creating Expense for Self / Helper / Technician?

value.stringValue: Please enter a valid distance travelled
PerDiem overnight cannot be checked if total per diem is 0 or empty. Cannot save Data.
